faqs.question: What is the typical lease duration for a commercial shop for rent in DLF Phase 1 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The standard lease duration in prime commercial zones like DLF Phase 1 usually ranges from 3 to 9 years with a lock-in period often set between 18 to 36 months depending on the specific property and tenant profile. Landlords prefer longer commitments given the high value and investment associated with these premium spaces. We help negotiate favorable lease terms including appropriate escalation clauses which are typically structured for a step-up rent increase every year or every three years based on market standards and agreed-upon percentage increases.
